passive.name: LEAGUE OF DRAVEN
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) LEAGUE OF DRAVEN
                                Killing a unit or catching a Spinning Axe grants a stack of Adoration.Killing champions grant 80 bonus gold, plus 4 per stack of Adoration.When Draven dies, half of Adoration stacks are lost.

q.name: (Q) SPINNING AXE
q.description:
(Q) SPINNING AXE
 10/9/8/7s   45 
                                
                                
                                Gains a Spinning Axe, causing next attack to deal an additional 45 physical damage (45/50/55/60 + 100/110/120/130% bonus ).The Spinning Axe bounces off the target, allowing Draven to catch and regain it.Draven can hold two Spinning Axes at once.

w.name: (W) BLOOD RUSH
w.description:
(W) BLOOD RUSH
 10s   40/35/30/25 
                                
                                
                                Gains 20/25/30/35% Attack Speed for 3 seconds and 50/55/60/65% decaying Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds.Catching a Spinning Axe refreshes Blood Rush's cooldown.

e.name: (E) STAND ASIDE
e.description:
(E) STAND ASIDE
 15/14/13/12s   70 
                                
                                
                                Throws his axes, dealing 75 physical damage (75/120/165/210 + 50% bonus ) and knock enemies aside, slowing them by 25/30/35/40% for 2 seconds.

r.name: (R) WHIRLING DEATH
r.description:
(R) WHIRLING DEATH
 70/65/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Hurls two massive axes, dealing 200 physical damage (200/300/400 + 130% bonus ).The axes return to Draven when they reach the edge of the map, hit a champion or upon reactivation.Deals 8% less damage as it damages targets, minimum 40%. Upon reversal, the reduction is reset to deal full damage.
